name: com.distantlands.cozy.core
description:
FOR RENDER PIPELINE SUPPORT: Please follow the online documentation.

Create stunning weather patterns for your game worlds! From time-of-day to annual seasons, from puffy clouds to raging storms, from sunny days to dense fog, COZY does it all with ease! Focus on your scene's colors and easily tweak all variables for ultimate customization!

Check out our extension modules on the Unity Asset Store!

samples.description: Collection of demo scenes that showcase the features of the main modules of COZY.
Collection of demo scenes designed to show off the features of the biome system including global vs local biomes, biome modules, and transitions.
Simple example UI that displays temperature, the current weather, the current time, and the current date.
Shader package that allows for 3D placeable fog cards in  your scene. URP support only.
Contains the old shader includes in the old location so that COZY 3 can support older assets that had integrations that are no longer maintained.
